channel.title: Dragon Claws
channel.description:
Okay, I've got the Client Side coding, and the Models. But I don't have the Server Side code that actually makes the Claws an item and gives them the 4 hit spec. I can't find the Server Side code anywhere. Does anybody know what it is? Also, if there is another thing I can use as Dragon Claws, but will still look like D Claws, please tell me.
My friend made his D Claws in his server, they looked like D Claws, except he had used White Claws instead of D Claws, and they still worked like it. I asked him for the code once but he hasn't given it to me. D:

And besides, I already have them added.

item.title: Dragon Claws
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“ledgman, post:7, topic:282914”]My tutorial.

This is for delta.

FOLLOW THIS
Files modified - Client.java - Special.java

Open up special.java and search for this twice. There will be 2 cases 3204’s.

case 3204:

Then add this underneath both of the case 3204’s.

case 8002:

Save and exit

…Open up client.java and search for this.


if(specOn == true && AttackingOn2.currentHealth > 0 && GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, absX, absY, 1)){//players
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3204 && specialAmount > 74){
specialAtk(true, 75, 282, 1203);
getHit(3);
usingSpecial = true;
}

Underneath that add this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068);
DCdown = 4;
DCDamg = true;
getHit(100);
usingSpecial = true;
}

You have just added your special.
But now you need to add another special so you can do your special on npc’s.

Now search for this.

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3204 && specialAmount > 74){
specialAtkNPC(true, 75, 282, 1203);
npcDamage(5);
}

Add this underneath that last bracket.

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAtkNPC(true, 25, 252, 2068);
DCdown = 4;
DCDamg = true;
npcDamage(8);
}

Last thing to do now is to make it hit 4x

Search for

Public boolean process

Add this exactly underneath that.

if ((IsAttackingNPC) && DCDamg == true ) { if (DCdown == 2 ) { startAnimation(2068); } SpecDamgNPC(30); DCdown -= 1; if (DCdown == 0 ) { DCDamg = false; } } if (IsAttacking == true && DCDamg == true ) { if (DCdown == 2 ) { startAnimation(2068); } SpecDamg(25); DCdown -= 1; if (DCdown == 0 ) { DCDamg = false; } } [/quote]
How is that your tutorial? That’s the same tutorial that everyone has been using.

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Claws
item.dc:creator: @ledgman ledgman
item.description:
@ledgman wrote:

My tutorial.

This is for delta.

FOLLOW THIS
Files modified - Client.java - Special.java

Open up special.java and search for this twice. There will be 2 cases 3204’s.

case 3204:

Then add this underneath both of the case 3204’s.

case 8002:

Save and exit

…Open up client.java and search for this.


if(specOn == true && AttackingOn2.currentHealth > 0 && GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, absX, absY, 1)){//players
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3204 && specialAmount > 74){
specialAtk(true, 75, 282, 1203);
getHit(3);
usingSpecial = true;
}

Underneath that add this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068);
DCdown = 4;
DCDamg = true;
getHit(100);
usingSpecial = true;
}

You have just added your special.
But now you need to add another special so you can do your special on npc’s.

Now search for this.

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3204 && specialAmount > 74){
specialAtkNPC(true, 75, 282, 1203);
npcDamage(5);
}

Add this underneath that last bracket.

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAtkNPC(true, 25, 252, 2068);
DCdown = 4;
DCDamg = true;
npcDamage(8);
}

Last thing to do now is to make it hit 4x

Search for

Public boolean process

Add this exactly underneath that.

if ((IsAttackingNPC) && DCDamg == true ) {
if (DCdown == 2 ) {
startAnimation(2068);
}
SpecDamgNPC(30);
DCdown -= 1;
if (DCdown == 0 ) {
DCDamg = false;
}
}
if (IsAttacking == true && DCDamg == true ) {
if (DCdown == 2 ) {
startAnimation(2068);
}
SpecDamg(25);
DCdown -= 1;
if (DCdown == 0 ) {
DCDamg = false;
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Claws
item.dc:creator: @Word_Life Word Life
item.description:
@Word_Life wrote:

[quote=“the hunt”]i lold at this topic.
all your friend did was change the colour of the d claws using metseqouia.
he didnt code anything.[/quote]

He’s actually a very good coder. Idk what he did. But he did code stuff. It looks like Dragon Claws, and has 4 specs.

Anyways…

I actually have the Dragon Claws now. I got them working. I found a tutorial on Google that came from this site. It was all screwed up on that page, so I found it in the Tutorials section here. It was “[317] Private Server Tutorials [317]” by r34p4g3pk. It turns out that in his adding custom models tutorial inside it, was adding Dragon Claws. Which was a good thing. Thanks jc for telling me to use google. (:

Read full topic
